li.OKResult: me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] read the manual, and gained knowledge of a new Law."));me:UnLockGong("Law_EightInnerGates");story:RemoveBindItem();

Story.Name: EVENTEightInnerGates
Story.Desc: You found a strange book in the floor while adventuring in the city.

li.OKResult: me:AddMsg(XT("[NAME] read the strip, and gained knowledge of a new Law. Disintegrating into their being, the strip of paper was no more. When [NAME] looked up, the warrior was nowhere to be seen."));me:UnLockGong("Law_EightInnerGates");story:RemoveBindItem();
